name: Durable
description: The hit points of this item are tripled.

name: Unreactive
description: This item resists corrosion and rot. If an environmental effect or creature would cause an item to become damaged, roll a d20. On an 11 or higher, the item is unaffected.

name: Lightweight
description: This item weighs half as much as normal. If it is a weapon with the heavy property, it loses this property. If it doesn't have the heavy property, it gains the light property.

name: Magnificent Finish
description: This item's finish is on point and it is worth twice its normal value.

name: Flashy
description: While you wear or hold the item, you have advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks against creatures that can see the item.

name: Insulated
description: If this item is clothing or armour, you have advantage on Constitution saves vs cold. If it's a weapon or held item, you have advantage on saves vs heat metal. Otherwise, reroll.

name: Grippy
description: You have advantage on checks to resist the item being disarmed or taken from you. If the item is neither a held item nor a weapon, reroll.

name: Quick Release
description: If this item is armour or a shield, it is quick to equip/stow. Otherwise, reroll.

name: Aerodynamic
description: If the item has the thrown property or is ammunition, it has improved range. Otherwise, reroll.

name: Perfect Balance
description: If weapon: reroll 1s on attack. If armour/clothing: reroll 1s on Acrobatics/Dex saves. Otherwise, reroll.

name: Artisanal Craftsmanship
description: Weapon: +1 to damage rolls. Armour/clothing: reduce nonmagical damage taken by 1. Otherwise, reroll.
